entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is mentioned as someone who has gotten used to hearing a certain sound. The text does not provide further information about Molly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one thinking of his parents' photograph and is being watched by Moody. He is also mentioned as someone who might die in a future event.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is watching Harry and is likely referring to a past event where they were outnumbered by the Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as an enemy group that outnumbered Harry's group twenty to one in a past event.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone who will eventually come around and forgive others. He is also the son of Arthur.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a future threat who will move into the open and cause the Ministry to beg for forgiveness.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who would be taken care of by others if Harry and Arthur died.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who would be taken care of by others if Harry and Arthur died.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is smiling slightly while talking about what would happen to Ron and Ginny if Harry and Arthur died.

relationships.description: Voldemort will move into the open and cause the Ministry to beg for forgiveness.
Harry has a family member in Ron.
Harry has a family member in Ginny.
Lupin will take care of Ron and Ginny if Harry and Arthur died.
